submission:
from typing import List
class Solution:
    def numberOfAlternatingGroups(self, colors: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n=len(colors)
        num=0
        i,j=0,1

        while j<n+k and i<n:
            d=j
            m=d%n
            while colors[m]!=colors[(m-1+n)%n] and (d<(n+k-1)):
                d+=1
                m=d%n
            num+=max(d-i-k+1,0)
            i=d
            j=i+1
        return num
